data.text: Mida akpe ne Yehowa,
Israel negblɔ be;
Aron ƒe aƒe la negblɔ be;
Ame siwo vɔ̃a Yehowa la negblɔ be,
Le nye vevesese me, medo ɣli yɔ Yehowa,
Yehowa li kplim, eya ta nyemavɔ̃ o.
Yehowa li kplim, eyae nye nye xɔnametɔ.
Enyo be woatsɔ Yehowa awɔ sitsoƒee
Enyo be woatsɔ Yehowa awɔ sitsoƒee wu, be
Dukɔwo katã ɖe to ɖem,
Woɖe to ɖem,
Woƒo kɔ ɖe ŋunye abe anyiwo ene,
Wotu asim do ɖe megbe,
Yehowae nye nye ŋusẽ kple nye ha,
Aseyetsotso kple dziɖuɣli le ɖiɖim
Yehowa ƒe nuɖusi le dzi bobobo!
Nyemaku o,
Yehowa he to nam vevie,
Miʋu dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe agbowo nam,
Esiae nye Yehowa ƒe agbo,
Mada akpe na wò,
Kpe si xɔtulawo gbe la,
Yehowae wɔ esia,
Esia nye ŋkeke si Yehowa wɔ,
O! Yehowa, ɖe mí, o Yehowa,
Woayra ame si gbɔna le Yehowa ƒe ŋkɔ me.
Yehowae nye Mawu,
Wòe nye nye Mawu, eya ta mada akpe na wò;
Mida akpe na Yehowa, elabena eƒe dɔ me nyo,
